text:
You: Can employees suggest ideas for new company events or initiatives?
Bot: Absolutely! We encourage suggestions. You can submit your ideas to the Employee Engagement Committee or directly to your HR representative.

You: Can you help me with this: how do i set up the vpn
Bot: Install the VPN client from our IT portal and follow the setup guide.

You: Are you there?
Bot: Yes, I'm here to help. Please let me know your prompt.

You: Can I work from home?
Bot: Remote work is permitted on a case-by-case basis. Please consult your manager for approval.

You: Where can I see the current job openings?
Bot: All current openings are listed at https://www.edeltaes.com/career

You: Where are the fire assembly points located?
Bot: The emergency exit maps, which include the location of fire extinguishers and designated assembly points, are posted near all staircases and elevators.

You: Where is the head office of our company located?
Bot: The head office is located in Ahmedabad, India.

You: Who do I report an issue with office equipment, like the AC or my chair?
Bot: Please contact with any teammates or colleagues for this facility or equipment issues.

You: How can I apply for an internship at the company?
Bot: You can apply for an internship through our Careers page or by contacting the HR department at hr@edeltaes.com.

You: How do I set up the VPN?
Bot: Install the VPN client from our IT portal and follow the setup guide.

You: I received a suspicious email. How should I report it?
Bot: Do not click on any links or download attachments. Please use the 'Report Phishing' button in your email client (Outlook/Gmail) or forward the email as an attachment to the IT security team.

You: How long does the hiring process usually take?
Bot: The hiring process usually takes 1â€“2 weeks depending on the role and number of applicants.

You: Can I install my own software?
Bot: Please contact IT for approval before installing any software.

You: Is there an open-door policy for managers?
Bot: Absolutely. We follow an open-door policy where employees are encouraged to communicate directly with leadership.

You: How can I report misconduct or policy violations?
Bot: You can report misconduct confidentially to HR via hr@edeltaes.com or through the anonymous feedback portal.

You: Could you tell me how to: can i access my email from home
Bot: Yes, use Outlook Web Access via our secure portal.

You: Please explain how I can: how do i configure outlook for work email
Bot: Open Outlook and follow the setup wizard using your work email credentials.

You: Can anyone participate in Fun Friday events?
Bot: Yes, all employees are encouraged to participate in Fun Friday activities.

You: That's all for now
Bot: Got it! Have a great day ahead.

You: How is employee feedback handled?
Bot: We conduct regular surveys, 1:1 meetings, and have an anonymous feedback system to continuously improve our work environment.

You: Why can't I install an application?
Bot: You might not have admin rights. Submit a request to IT.

You: How are employees selected for rewards and recognition?
Bot: Employees are nominated by peers and managers based on contribution, collaboration, and results achieved.

You: Where are the key project documents stored?
Bot: All project-related documents, such as the Statement of Work (SOW) and project plans, are maintained in a dedicated folder on our shared drive (e.g., SharePoint or Google Drive).

You: Is the company culture supportive for new employees?
Bot: Yes, new employees receive onboarding support, mentorship, and access to training resources to help them settle in comfortably.

You: Can you help me with this: how do i report a suspicious email
Bot: Forward it to phishing@company.com.

You: Does the company offer internship opportunities?
Bot: Yes, we offer internship programs for final-year students and recent graduates.

You: Please explain how I can: can i install my own software
Bot: Please contact IT for approval before installing any software.

You: Can you help me with this: why am i not receiving any emails
Bot: Check your spam folder and ensure your inbox is not full.

You: What should I do to: how do i report a suspicious email
Bot: Forward it to phishing@company.com.

You: Kindly guide me how to: how do i configure outlook for work email
Bot: Open Outlook and follow the setup wizard using your work email credentials.

You: Is there a designated parking area for employees?
Bot: Yes, employee parking is available in the basement levels.

You: Can you help me with this: how do i request a new user account
Bot: Submit a user access request form through the IT portal.

You: Kindly guide me how to: what is 2fa
Bot: 2FA is two-factor authentication. It adds an extra layer of security to your login.

You: Please explain how I can: my account is locked. what should i do
Bot: Reach out to IT support to unlock your account.

You: What is the recruitment process at your company?
Bot: Our recruitment process typically includes an initial screening, a technical round, and an HR interview.

You: Kindly guide me how to: how do i report a suspicious email
Bot: Forward it to phishing@company.com.

You: Does the company participate in campus placements?
Bot: Yes, we actively recruit through campus placement drives in selected institutions.

You: What should I do to: my account is locked. what should i do
Bot: Reach out to IT support to unlock your account.

You: What should I do to: how do i request a new user account
Bot: Submit a user access request form through the IT portal.

You: Can you help me with this: vpn keeps disconnecting. what can i do
Bot: Check your internet connection and restart your VPN client.

You: Please explain how I can: how do i unlock my account
Bot: Wait 15 minutes or contact IT to manually unlock it.

You: Who should I contact if I find a discrepancy in my salary?
Bot: For any payroll-related queries or issues, please contact to Mr.Chirag Makwana.

You: Can you help me with this: how do i install company-approved software
Bot: Use the Company Software Center application.

You: How do I configure Outlook for work email?
Bot: Open Outlook and follow the setup wizard using your work email credentials.

You: Could you tell me how to: my account is locked. what should i do
Bot: Reach out to IT support to unlock your account.

You: Kindly guide me how to: can i install my own software
Bot: Please contact IT for approval before installing any software.

Bot: Use the Company Software Center application.
